TopicTitle: How to get Mods and Saves into Steam KSP

Articles.Content: Okay, I transferred my game to Steam cause I play a lot of games there, but I want my saves and mods into it. How do I do this or am I to start anew with nothing.
Should be able to do that by going to Computer > C:/ > Program Files (x86) > steam > SteamApps > (your username) > KSP. I think that will work please tell me if it does or doesn't.
the KSP folder didn't show up, and I would show you a picture but I can't post attachments, and it said I'd already downloaded KSP to steam
thank you, now i just replace the Plugin_Data, Plugin, Parts folders
DO NOT replace those files, or you will lose all of your parts and plugins! Just open the modded parts file and drag the contents to the KSP parts file, same with Plugins, Plugin_Data ect.
What Austin said. Merge, do not replace. (unless you have a very specific reason to do so, and you understand the conciquences)
oh, you had me scared, i did merge
